attributes.action: extend train station platforms in the South East  to allow train operators to run 12 carriage trains, thus alleviating chronic overcrowding at peak times.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is one simple way to alleviate overcrowding on our commuter trains. Train platforms need to be extended on all routes, so that the train operators can then operate 12 carriage trains, (or more if future demand dictates).
